codeSystem.name: ParticipationSignature
codeSystem.desc: A set of codes specifying whether and how the participant has attested his participation through a signature and or whether such a signature is needed.

code.originalText: Definition: The particpant intends to provide a signature.
Definition: Signature has been affixed, either written on file, or electronic (incl. digital) signature in Participation.signatureText.
Definition: A signature for the service is required of this actor.
